website_summaries.verdict: A versatile toaster with an impressive set of features. Toasts everything from toast to bagels evenly and effectively.
pros: Sleek metal design and capable of toasting up to four items at once
Convenient features include dual controls, LDC display, and wide slots
cons: It's somewhat expensive, but you get a lot of features for the price

customer_reviews.title: Worst toaster ever!!
customer_reviews.text: As the headline says, worst toaster ever. It takes forever to toast the bread. No matter the setting, one side is burnt and the other barely toasted at all. We had had a Kitchenaid toaster previously that we really liked so decided to replace it with another Kitchenaid. What a disappointment. If it wasn't such a big deal to return it, I would send it back crumbs and all. Now I have to find a new toaster that actually does what a toaster is supposed to do. Don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P. Vaillant

customer_reviews.title: This toaster is a hottie
customer_reviews.text: I like this Toaster. Nice enough to leave out on the counter. Settings are easy to figure out. Toast browns evenly . Good to have four slots to get the job done fast for breakfast. Slots are wide enough for bagels and it has a bagel setting. The only shortcoming is that the toast doesn't pop up really high when done, so the handle needs to be held up to get more access to the toast. Also the toaster makes a sound when it is done, so if you don't want your appliances talking to you, then don't get this one. I have had this for 6 months with no problems noted.
customer_reviews.author: CC from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Kind of annoying. Would be better if the toaster had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Lighted menu not lit until you push down on the toaster push down lever. Kind of annoying. Would be better if the toaster had a "sleep mode" that would activate once you touched it, saving power, but one that provides a menu to choose from before you start the toasting cycle. Also, toaster lock down mechanism is a little difficult, since it doesn't engage easily, and you have to force it down a little more aggressively to get the device to lock. Once locked down, THEN you can choose the level of toasting.... kind of a cart in front of the horse analogy
customer_reviews.author: Doc Holliday DDS

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid 4 Slice Toaster Works Great !
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching all over for a 4 slice toaster to replace our old, cheaper one that finally gave out after ten years. I read all the reviews and searched many stores online. I finally settled on this one. I have to say the toasting is perfect no matter which setting you put it on. It also tastes great because whatever you are toasting is perfectly done. The only problem - albeit a minor one, is that the toast or bagel doesn't come all the way up when it's done. But to me, that is a minor thing. I just pick it up with my fingers and it is fine. Great toasting and price was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen aid is the best
customer_reviews.text: The toaster does an excellent job toasting several shades with a single cycle. The highest setting is too dark for me, and I love dark toast. Aside from functioning well it looks GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This toaster annoyed me on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.text: For $160 I expect a little more from a toaster. 1. The plastic levers broke off...2. (see pics). It doesn't toast evenly and I believe the difference is a bit drastic. Updated. The plastic levers have now been 3 time. I don't know what happened to the left metal lever, it must have feel of inside the toasted. The right lever got stuck in the down position and make my house all smoky.
customer_reviews.author: A Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Best .... toaster ... ever ......
customer_reviews.text: This and his little two slice brother have got to be two of the best toaster ever made ....... they look good ..... they feel like quality ..... and their toast level is consistent every single time..... set the first 2 slots to a level '2' and the next two slots to a level '4' and 2 years down the road, you will be getting the exact same toasting consistency .... a very good purchase ..... //Carl
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: Works great with daily or more use.
customer_reviews.text: One Piece of Toast – Check Two Pieces of Toast – Check Three Pieces of Toast – Check Four Pieces of Toast – Check This toaster will have you bases covered. Works great and completes the toasting process in a reasonable amount of time. Even toasting in my opinion. I like the design and it seems to be well built. This gets used daily and have had it for about three months now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: bugeater

customer_reviews.title: Great - For Two Weeks...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toaster, but the right side slot lever no longer works properly. It worked correctly for about two weeks and then started hanging up and not dropping the toast the whole way down. Most expensive toaster I ever bought - really not impressed with the workmanship that the one manual piece on the whole unit began failing after only two weeks. It does do a beautiful job toasting evenly on both sides, and it can still be used, but it should be more durable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aid toaster
customer_reviews.text: When my husband came into the kitchen after I had set our new toaster up on the counter he immediately noticed it. He rarely notices this sort of thing, so I think this is significant. It is indeed very pretty. Not only is it good looking, but it works exactly as I hoped it would. It is easy to set, and the beep that informs us that the toast is ready is not abrasive as some tend to be. The temperature setting is easy to set and accurate. Added to all of that it is very easy to clean. I have had many toasters and this one seems terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Black

customer_reviews.title: didn't work well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking toaster. Unfortunately, only one side works, and it is extremely slow to toast. Really, really, slow. And there is an annoying "End of Cycle" alarm that beeps when the toast is done. I suppose it's necessary, since unlike most toasters, with this one you have time to go read a book or do some laundry while waiting for your toast to cook, and the alarm cues you to come back to the kitchen. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who has visited and tried it has loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I decided to buy a toaster that wasn't an eventual throwaway! This is the Cadillac of toasters! The segment bars let you know how long you have to wait, and this toaster does make you wait! The temperature ranges are huge and the slots for the lift handles go above the loading position so that you can push the finished product up higher to grab it! No more tongs! Everyone who has visited and tried it has loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is larger than I expected -- my wife calls it "The Spaceship". It's a nice looking appliance, very modern. Performance is outstanding as well. For a mid-range toaster, I'm very happy with the purchase. Yes, I probably could have gotten away with another $15 unit, where I'll pry bagels out with a knife every so often. But this is really nice, and we're happy with the spaceship.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: toaster reviews generally seem pretty poor so with appropriate expectations you should be happy ...
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is quite attractive but it isn't the fastest one out there. Fresh bagels take a long time to toast and I haven't even tried to toast a frozen bagel. However, toaster reviews generally seem pretty poor so with appropriate expectations you should be happy with this. And it will look good on your counter when you aren't using it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster was great for the first year but now it only toasts the top diagonal in all slots. Before splurging on this beauty, I had a $5 toaster with plastic bag melted on the side that I couldn't kill no matter how hard I tried. I finally just got rid of it so I could buy this pretty one. Now I wish I had my not as attractive but much more reliable little toaster back. sniff.
customer_reviews.author: misfit5

customer_reviews.title: We love the bagel setting
customer_reviews.text: We toast a lot of bread products! Toast, muffins and bagels etc., We love the bagel setting, toasts the inside, but leaves the outside softer. We were looking for a red toaster, and this fit the bill. Our kitchen is mostly stainless steel and red accents, so worked out great. Very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary801

customer_reviews.title: Very Good ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Toasts evenly for the most part ... one side is very slightly darker than the other, but not much. I like the heavyweight feel. I like the bold red color. I like the digital display. The handles are easy up and down. It looks much more expensive than it is. And it's KitchenAid, so you know it's a quality product. I have nothing negative to say about it. I like it a lot! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel28

customer_reviews.title: Worst Toaster Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My children wanted to get my husband a four slice toaster for Christmas as he cooks a majority of the meals. They wanted him to be able to eat toast/bagels with us rather then him wait and eat after us. The toaster worked ok for the first 6 uses. Then the left side stopped working all together and trips the GFI. Very Disappointed that we have had this toaster less then 60 days and it has stopped working. Is it possible to get a refund or make a return?
customer_reviews.author: ALW

customer_reviews.title: One year and it does't work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster one year ago and I loved it. Gives your plenty of choices to toast. Sadly to say it does not work anymore. For the money I spent you would think it would last more than a year. I have had cheaper models that have last 10 years. Wanted this toaster because of the features.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Toaster, but make sure you have some counter space as it is Huge !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken toaster
customer_reviews.text: My toaster came with one side broke , it wouldn’t stay down to toast , had hard time replacing it , says it was bought through 3rd party . It was purchased through amazon
customer_reviews.author: Carlene Bevilacqua

customer_reviews.title: good toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster so far. Has been working very well for me and like the lift to get the toast out. It can handle the bagels very well and the one side toasting works. I am happy with this and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dapster

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Beep
customer_reviews.text: We have had this in use for 2 months and can say it is the best toaster we have ever owned. Toasts all bread products quite nicely. Only complaint is the annoying end of cycle beep. You can hear a toaster pop up without having to have it beep at you. One star deduct for that.
customer_reviews.author: Maile's Boss

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I have used
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many of them. Each one has had a problem with their springs or temperature control etc etc. This one looks good as well as works really smoothly. It has digital display and better temperature control. Feels really well built. Quality is amazing. It looks good in the kitchen as well. Cleaning is super easy as well using the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Meister

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster. I really like the digital settings and display timer Some of the basic programming abilities allow you to tweak your toast, bagels and other toastable delicacies. The construction is sturdy and solid. This is one of the best toasters I have used in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D. Huff

customer_reviews.title: great toaster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster for my son about four weeks ago as his old toaster was taking ages to brown the bread. We have been using it every day since for bread and bagels and it works just fine. You can set the level for toasting and it beeps when the bread is ready. It was definitely a great buy and I,ve told my son that it might be better if I take it with me when I return to England.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this toaster. The only complaint is with the settings. Sometimes I need to put it on 7 and other times it will burn at 7. Hoping this will improve with use. It might just take some getting used to this different method of toasting various breads, bagels, and muffins.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: too slow
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking toaster and thinking being it is a KitchenAid it would work great, but it sucks. It is very slow which results in very dry toast. Also being slow, there is no advantage to 4 slices, a faster 2 slice could make as many pieces. We are going to try and see if KitchenAid will fix or replace it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lamz

customer_reviews.title: Best looking, worst working toaster I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best looking, but worst working toaster I've ever had. It toasts differently every time. No consistency between sides of bread. I have to guess, and re toast over and over again. Most of the time it burns the toast.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Super Toast. Super Bagles. Flawless
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best toaster we have ever had, bar none. It does everything we want it to, everytime. The numerical settings for toastiness is a great system. The toast or bagle is toasted all over. There are no gaps in the toasting and it just works great. BUY this machine. You wil NOT be dissappointed
customer_reviews.author: fastreader

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this toaster at our house! It has a digital display and my husband and I can have our OWN SIDE with our OWN SETTINGS... haha... works well for us! You don't have to toast on just one side when less than 2 slices... just pick your OWN SIDE and GO FOR IT! Perfect color in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: C Bajema

customer_reviews.title: TOASTY
customer_reviews.text: Toaster is great. Toasts well. Has digital light to dark setting, also beeps when done. Good quality. I wasn't sure about the red, I wanted stainless and my husband ordered the red. Actually the red is not a bright color more matte, it works well with my kitchen. Very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster. I've tried them all and this is the best. Can't go wrong eith anything KitchenAid. Color matches all my other products. Toasts evenly, great trays to remove crumbs.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it's slow
customer_reviews.text: It does a nice job toasting, but be prepared to wait. Looks very nice on the counter. The reheat option is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah  J Murmylo

customer_reviews.title: 3 Year of Use Then Levers Broke
customer_reviews.text: We had this toaster for 3 years before the levers that you press down broke off. First one, then the other. KitchenAid replaced them twice but they won't stay on. A toaster should last at least 10 years. I won't buy KitchenAid again. We use it about 2x/day.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster ever
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster we've owned.. Our last one broke due to the kids dropping a quarter inside of it that shorted it out. Great price at the time of purchase as these ones are not cheap at the stores. Can't wait for it to get here so we can use it and retire the crappy one we bought as a quick fix.
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and toasts well.
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous toaster. Controls are easy and it even has arrows to show how to insert a bagel in bagel mode. Be aware, this is a large toaster with a large footprint if counter space is a consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Arby

customer_reviews.title: All of my other Kitchen-aid appliances are great, but not this toaster
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't toast the bread evenly. I have to turn it to get browned on both sides. The toast doesn't pop up all the way. I have to use the lever to push it all the way up to keep from burning myself. I should have returned it after I purchased it, but I didn't. All of my other Kitchen-aid appliances are great, but not this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra Loving

customer_reviews.title: Dano
customer_reviews.text: Received this item on a very timely basis and made toast and bagels within the first ten minutes. I really enjoy the digital setting from one to five (light to dark) toast! We also like the cancel button which allows you to stop toasting. Really enjoying this Toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Second One Great!
customer_reviews.text: After having to return the first one for uneven toasting, this one does as it should and makes perfect toast. And of course, Amazon's return and exchange policy is the best ever!
customer_reviews.author: SCYankee

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toaster. Bought two of them. It does toast of all sizes, bagells, defrosts, and reheats. You can adjust the doneness as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sedviga

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed this toaster very much. It replaced our toaster oven for toasting bread, rolls and bagels. Everything thing toast evenly and doesn't come out hard and dry like the toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Kruszka

customer_reviews.title: It makes a fine piece of toast
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, works well, and has all the features I need (defrost, bagel modes). The progress countdown is nice and the simple beep at the end of the cycle is appreciated for when you're out of the room. No more cold breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Was good at first then it died
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about 4 months ago. over the last several months i had to keep upping the amount of time to toast in order to brown the bread. Now it only heats up the bread and does not toast. I would have hoped this product would have lasted longer than 4 months. I cant return it - so, I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is sooo nice
customer_reviews.text: Such and up grade on our old toaster. Love the digital display with the "countdown bars". I know just how long I've got to wait and thee digital heat setting is nice too. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Daniel cox

customer_reviews.title: Amazon fabulous about returns
customer_reviews.text: Came flawed ,one side would not stay in heat position,but Amazon was fabulous about easy to return
customer_reviews.author: Soozie

customer_reviews.title: Not more than expected
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this toaster for bagels and it works just fine. Using on a setting of 5, the bagels are evenly browned in about 4 minutes. I really like the crumb trays that are spring loaded for easy removal from the back of the unit. The only problem I've found is when the bagels are done, the unit does not pop them up far enough to remove them without a pair tongs. You could easily burn your fingers trying to remove them. If I ever need another toaster, I'll buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: George LaPorte

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster. Perfect bagels and toast. I love the count down feature which shows you how much longer yu before the toaster is done. It is slow compared to cheap units but I think that why it so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid 4 slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster ever! Love the digital display, all the bread settings, and having a 4 slicer!
customer_reviews.author: Julee

customer_reviews.title: Love my KitchenAid Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this toaster! It is simple to use and easy to keep clean. Toasts my bagel or sliced bread perfect every time. Love the digital screen. Easy to read and see. Meets all my needs!
customer_reviews.author: arlaine eaton

customer_reviews.title: We have had the toaster for a couple of months ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had the toaster for a couple of months now and it is working very well. It toasts the bread evenly but it takes a longer time than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: wilken

customer_reviews.title: DON'T waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: I love kitchenaid but they cant make a toaster. I love everything else I have from them but this toaster just didn't work. The shade goes up to 7. At 3 my toast was almost burnt and my bagel on 2 was hard on top and soft on the bottom. Very inconsistent toasting. After 3 or 4 uses the lever you push down did not lock. Had to send it back. Thanks to amazon returns and getting a refund is super simple. I wanted to ignore the negative reviews but they are right. Choose another toaster to try.
customer_reviews.author: Baker Girl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it,just a little large for counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rovero

customer_reviews.title: toaster
customer_reviews.text: problem with uniform toasting. i.e. both sides of toast are different; appearance and all other aspects are good for example beagles
customer_reviews.author: August A. Longo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Received the toaster from Amazon on time. This toaster takes forever to toast a slice of bread. The quality of this product is cheap, faux stainless. Typical imported trash. Will be lucky to get two years. Looks nice, about the only thing I can say good about it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ... but it beeps
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster the settings are easy and accurate. Only drawback is that it beeps and it doesn't seem that disabling this is an option given to the consumer. I wish there was some way to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: HChaker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small sized school where it gets daily ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Perfect for a small sized school where it gets daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and an even Better Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Toaster exceeded all expectations. Does a wonderful job on bagels, toast, ect. Easy clean feature is a real plus. Great value for the price. Highly recommend the Kitchen Aid 4-Slice Toaster.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looked great, had a good price and a name brand I've trusted. Unfortunately, I think we got a lemon. The lever used to start the toaster is really hard to slide all the way down and it doesn't engage in the "on" position easily because of this. I'm thinking I need to return this toaster and try a new one. That said, my friend has the exact toaster and has had no issues with it. Their toaster levers slide die easily and engage in the "on" position as one would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this toaster, one would think you are getting the best, but no... The toasting is so slow and you have to push down the button firmly and the force eventually makes the button break. I went to visit my brother who has the same toaster and his button was broken as well. I decided to order a button but they are on back order probably because everyone's button has broken off! Very annoying. I will invest in a commercial toaster next time. Good luck on your hunt for a good toaster!
customer_reviews.author: E. Adam

customer_reviews.title: Toasts one side perfectly
customer_reviews.text: First toaster I have ever owned that toasted Thomas' English Muffins perfectly. Enough said. BTW it does a good job on regular toast.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Murk

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and seems to work well. We have not used it to mush yet. But, so far I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my next toaster. Works beautifully and the red color really brightens my black and white kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed for the following reasons: It's overly large and cumbersome; After having used it for a few months, already one of the handles broke off through normal use. The thin plastic that holds the handle in place broke off. For a toaster such as this..... That should not happen in such a short time of usage!! Next time I will avoid a toaster made by KitchenAid.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Still like it after using it for several months!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this toaster for several months on a daily basis and really like it. We get what we expect to get from a toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Eissa

customer_reviews.title: like this toaster
customer_reviews.text: So far this a great product. It is pretty, has nice features, and appears to be well made. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Tolstead

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: First expensive (over $20) Toaster we ever bought, wish we had done it a lot sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toaster. The slots were designed in the era ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful toaster. The slots were designed in the era of Wonder Bread. That is so disappointing. Most slices of bread from pre-sliced to artisan loaves are wider than these slots. Sigh... I went for form over function.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Too much tech, too little toasting
customer_reviews.text: For crying out loud...this "toaster" - which is more like a tanning bed for bread - is just ridiculous. It doesn't toast both sides evenly at all, and though they were thoughtful enough to build-in an alarm clock to wake you once your toast was finally "done", this is just one more gadget that someone thought was a good idea that was over-thought. Look, just TOAST BREAD, okay? We don't need to marvel at how much crap you can add to a simple kitchen appliance. Really, do NOT buy this toaster. Just don't. I swear, you'll wish you had taosted your bread with a bic lighter instead. That would be faster, and more thorough.
customer_reviews.author: S. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: very slow toasting, my rye bread becomes rock hard before it's toasted.
customer_reviews.author: L. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Love IT
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it was a little expensive considering they have the same toaster at Costco in black for less. BUT I WANTED RED!! It matches my mixer just perfect and works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Carlyn Wise

customer_reviews.title: this baby is a nice toaster, top of the line for
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this baby is a nice toaster, top of the line for sure
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toaster
customer_reviews.text: I adore this toaster. Finally, a toaster that is not a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Paine

customer_reviews.title: Great Look-Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toaster because of the 4 slots/bagel option and the GREAT LOOK! Very pleased It's looks terrific in our red themed kitchen and the toast/bagels turn out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeside

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is much nicer and works a lot better than my $150 Breville toaster. It toasts very evenly, resists fingerprints and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Kricket

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aid has Done it Again
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is simply the best toaster we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Moore

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: I got this toaster a little bit over a year ago. It worked well at first, and then it started to brown unevenly, and now, one half won't even stay down. Today it actually gave me a shock. Now I'm afraid to touch a freakin' toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Jennings

customer_reviews.title: "Couldn't  have made a better choice"
customer_reviews.text: Our KitchenAid 4-slice toaster is another example of superior KitchenAid quality. We've been using it for three months now and we love it. It's reliability, ease of operation and the enhancement it brings to the attractiveness of our kitchen makes us proud owners.
customer_reviews.author: jack m. thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: Consistently toasts based on the setting and therefore will not burn your stuff. That's more than I can say for any other toaster I have owned, ever. Especially those crappy analog dial turn toasters that go to 11 and burn your toast when someone bumps the nob.
customer_reviews.author: W. MADDEN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: hubby was very pleased with his gift... already in use
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster! It has a ton of features and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jancey

customer_reviews.title: Just what you would expect from KitchenAid
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. We've been using it for 2 to 3 weeks, it does all we ask of it.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN WINNETT

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, well-made toaster
customer_reviews.text: Very nice,well-made toaster. Toasts evenly, is easy to use and easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JGreen in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Tough, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Office mates begged me to buy a toaster for the office kitchen for bagels. This is a tough appliance that can hold up to the 50+ people in my office.
customer_reviews.author: JuliePRG

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster! The defrost button actually works, and works well. The different levels are perfect for getting your toast right and not burnt. And I love the 'ding' when your toast is done. You can be on the other end of the house and hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Neis

customer_reviews.title: I really like this toaster
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toaster, however when pressing the leaver down to start the toasting the lever sometmes does not want to stay down. Other than that I really love the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: michael masiello

customer_reviews.title: Great Toast
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster and has lots of useful functions. It is a little slow at browning toast but I just put it on and go and do something else. Nice design and finish and look good on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: It browns beautifully and is easy to adjust to different browning levels
customer_reviews.text: It browns beautifully and is easy to adjust to different browning levels. The toaster is easy to clean and pretty to look at with substantial heft to keep from looking and being fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Berliant

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as I Thought
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is larger than I thought and the knobs that control the degree of toasting are only good up to 3. After that everything comes out burned. At the 3 setting, bread is very brown. Bagels come out ok on the 2 setting. Can't imagine why the settings go up to 7.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyDuck

customer_reviews.title: It is so pretty and works well
customer_reviews.text: It is so pretty and works well. I was happy with the prompt delivery and the BEST price of anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Allen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece. Very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. Very happy with the quality, the color, the stainless steel. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Edmonston

customer_reviews.title: Works great it even beeps when toast is done and has ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great it even beeps when toast is done and has a timer of lines telling u how many seconds u have till its done
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: This has got to be the best set of toaster I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best set of toaster I've ever purchased. It over toasts my bread when you just put in 1 toast instead of 2. It also over toasts if you put a second set of bread slices immediately after toasted one set on the same heat number since the toaster is already pre-warmed. The LCD is cool, but I thought it would show me a real-time countdown of how many more seconds left before the toaster would be done. But instead it just shows the heat level of the toast. The color of this toaster is just so great. Makes it very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rajesh Kumar

customer_reviews.title: toast as you like it for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: toasts each type of item to your specification. Does well with toast, bagels, english muffins, etc. Great toaster! Recommended without reservation
customer_reviews.author: Linda B. Kirchberger

customer_reviews.title: Kitchenaid Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Toaster works great except it takes a while to cook frozen bagels and pastries, longer than others I have had. Very quick on cooking toast and only needs to be set on a 2 or toast gets burned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best toaster ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toaster I ever tried. It actually toasts both side of the bread fairly evenly & doing bagels is a dream. My daughter told me about it & I've already told 2 sister's & my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Bragdon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to the kitchen! Cooks toast to perfection and the slots are wide enough for bagels and thicker breads
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toaster, functions great and is pleasing to the
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toaster, functions great and is pleasing to the eye
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Rife

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I like this toaster. The only negative is it's quite large. I can't keep it on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but very slow to make toast. Seems to lack power. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Myers

product_meta.title: KitchenAid KMT422ER 4-Slice Toaster with Manual High-Lift Lever and Digital Display - Empire Red
product_meta.description: Color:Empire RedSleek style meets ultimate functionality with this KitchenAid 4-Slice Toaster. Use the toaster's extra-wide slots to precisely toast bread or bagels, defrost and toast frozen food, quickly reheat toasted food or keep toasted food warm for up to one minute. And the digital display's progress bar lets you know just when your item will be ready to enjoy.
